headline.main: The Road to a New Afghanistan

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''After Afghanistan: Where Bush Takes Global War on Terror Begins to Raise Some Unsettling Questions'' (news analysis, front page, Nov. 21) pinpoints the concerns that many people have about the future course of our war against terrorism. But the questions raised are not just unsettling; they're downright frightening.
abstract: Cy Shain letter urges against 'reckless' expansion of war against terrorism to Iraq (S)
